sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013; while Dutch, India, Japan and China decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
The sum value of Dutch, India, Japan, China and Britain decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.

The sum value of Dutch, India, Japan, China and Britain decrease greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
